title.en: A Prayer for the Spread of the Omniscient Buddha's Teachings

text.en: Among the thousand buddhas of this fortunate age,
text.en-trans: kalzang sangye tong lé khyepardu

text.en: You are the most wondrous and majestic, as rare as anuḍumbaraflower,
text.en-trans: ngotsar u dum wa ra tar pak shing

text.en: You who care for our world during this age of conflict,
text.en-trans: tsöpé dü dir zhingkham yong zungwa

text.en: Mighty sage, Siddhārtha, to you I pay homage!
text.en-trans: tub chok dön kün drub la chaktsal lo

text.en: All you buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas in all directions,
text.en-trans: chok chü sangye changsem nyenrang dang

text.en: Great bodhisattvas, Mañjuśrī, Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: jamyang chenzik chak na dorjé dzin

text.en: Vajrapāṇi, Maitreya and the rest,
text.en-trans: jampa lasok changchub sempa dang

text.en: Together with the sixteen sthaviras and seven great patriarchs,1
text.en-trans: neten chudruk té rab chenpo dün

text.en: Six ornaments2and two supreme ones3of this world, the two marvellous ācāryas,4
text.en-trans: dzamling gyen chok mejung lobpön ché

text.en: Eighty-four mahāsiddhas, and the rest,
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk gyechu tsa zhi sok

text.en: And especially, the Lotus-born Guru, whose kindness is beyond compare,
text.en-trans: khyepar kadrin nyammé pema jung

text.en: Śāntarakṣita, Tri Songdetsen, Vairotsana and Atiśa,
text.en-trans: zhitso trisong vairo atisha

text.en: Five Sakya Patriarchs,5Marpa, Milarepa and Gampopa,
text.en-trans: gongma nam nga mar mi dakpo jé

text.en: Lama Tsongkhapa, Mañjughoṣa in person, and all the rest,
text.en-trans: jamyang lama lasok gya bö kyi

text.en: All you great learned and accomplished vidyādharas of India and Tibet,
text.en-trans: khé dang drubpé rigdzin tsok nam dang

text.en: And all you peaceful and wrathfulyidamdeities, ḍākinīs and dharmapālas—
text.en-trans: yidam zhitro khandro chökyong sok

text.en: We invoke you! Turn your wisdom minds towards us, and look upon us with compassion!
text.en-trans: tukdam né né kul lo tukjé gong

text.en: All the teachings of the Buddha—Vinaya, Sūtra, Abhidharma,
text.en-trans: tubten dulwa dodé ngönpa dang

text.en: The four classes of tantra within the Secret Mantra,
text.en-trans: sang ngak gyüdé chenpo nampa zhi

text.en: The teachings of the ten great pillars of the study lineage6in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: gangjong shé gyü ka chen chupo dang

text.en: And the eight great chariots of the practice lineage,7
text.en-trans: drubgyü shingta ché gyé lasokpa

text.en: All the sūtra and mantra traditions of the Buddha’s teachings—
text.en-trans: tubten do dang ngak kyi tsul tadak

text.en: Look now and see the extent to which they have all declined!
text.en-trans: shintu nyampar gyurpa di la zik

text.en: The saffron-robed saṅgha, upholders of the victory banner of discipline and renunciation,
text.en-trans: ngejung tsultrim ngurmik gyaltsen tok

text.en: Bodhisattvas who, without pretense or deception, genuinely seek to benefit others,
text.en-trans: zhenpen zolmé changchub sempa dang

text.en: And holders of awareness mantras who maintain the commitments, and practise generation and completion—
text.en-trans: damtsik den zhing kyedzok rik ngak chang

text.en: Look how these practitioners have been reduced to pale imitations of the real thing, like a mere drawing of a butter lamp!
text.en-trans: tsennyi denpa rimö marmé tar

text.en: Look upon us now with your eyes of wisdom, and care for us in your compassion, we pray!
text.en-trans: gyurpa di la yeshe chenden nam

text.en: Beings of this evil age with its five degenerations,
text.en-trans: ngepar gong la tukjé kyab tu sol

text.en: Are caught in the bonds of turbulent and destructive emotions, their cravings and desires.
text.en-trans: dü ngen nyikma nga dö semchen nam

text.en: The followers of the teachings fight amongst themselves,
text.en-trans: nyönmong tob drak dö sé chingwé ching

text.en: Spurred on by the fierce winds of jealousy,
text.en-trans: ten la zhuk nam trakdok lungmar gyi

text.en: And degenerate views are widespread.
text.en-trans: tenpa nang truk tawé nyikma gyé

text.en: Through these defilements, brought about by conflicts within the tradition,
text.en-trans: tsöpachen du gyurpé ten sel gyi

text.en: The Dharma protectors, guardians of all that is positive, have turned away from us,
text.en-trans: drib kyi chökyong karchok sungma yel

text.en: While warrior-likeasurasand barbarians fill the world—
text.en-trans: gyalkham küntu lhamin lalö kheng

text.en: In these and other ways, the teachings have declined.
text.en-trans: di dang didrar gyurpé tenpa nub

text.en: Kyema Kyihü! O compassionate protectors!
text.en-trans: kyema kyi hü gönpo tukjé chen

text.en: Increase the power and strength of your sacred commitments!
text.en-trans: khyö nam tukdam tutsal tob kyé la

text.en: Why would you be discouraged by the sadness of these evil times?
text.en-trans: dü ngen kyowé zhumpa chi la nga

text.en: Since you are masters of the ten strengths and possessors of the ten powers,
text.en-trans: tob chü wangchuk wang chu ngawé na

text.en: You must surely heal and restore the teachings.
text.en-trans: tenpa nyampa didak sorchü ching

text.en: Send us genuine teachers who are learned, disciplined and accomplished,
text.en-trans: khé tsün drubtob tsemar gyurpa ni

text.en: To breathe fresh life into the Buddhadharma!
text.en-trans: mangpor trul né tenpa sowar dzö

text.en: In both India and Tibet, may the precious lamps of joyful celebration,
text.en-trans: pak bö nyi su dzokden chima yi

text.en: Be set ablaze, to usher in another golden age,
text.en-trans: gatön rinchen drönmé barwa dang

text.en: And may the non-sectarian, lotus-like teachings of the Buddha, flourish and blossom.
text.en-trans: gyalten rimé petsal dar la bab

text.en: May the minds of those who harbour ill-will towards the teachings be changed,
text.en-trans: dé la khuwé tsok kyi sem gyur zhing

text.en: And filled with inspiration to practise the ten virtuous actions.
text.en-trans: kün kyang ten la dün dang gé chur chö

text.en: May the saṅgha, the holders of the teachings, fill this world of ours,
text.en-trans: tendzin gendün dé yi dzamling khyab

text.en: And study and practice increase and spread.
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpa dar zhing gyepar shok

text.en: May vast clouds of offerings fill all monasteries and temples,
text.en-trans: tsuklakhang nam chöpé trin tsok gyé

text.en: And the great drum of the Dharma resound far and wide,
text.en-trans: dampé chö kyi nga chen rabtu drok

text.en: Annihilating the deluded arguments of thetīrthikas,
text.en-trans: mutek langpö lepa gem jé ching

text.en: And sounding the victory of the Buddhadharma in all directions.
text.en-trans: tubten chok lé nampar gyal gyur chik

text.en: May the lives of all the holders of the teachings be secure,
text.en-trans: tendzin kyé nam zhabpé tenpa dang

text.en: And may the lives and merits of benefactors increase,
text.en-trans: tenpé jindak tsé dang sönam pel

text.en: May even the names of those who would harm the teachings disappear,
text.en-trans: ten la nö nam ming gi lhakmar gyur

text.en: And may the victory banner of the teachings be raised in all directions!
text.en-trans: tenpé gyaltsen chok chur dreng gyur chik
